text: so I've been using Iowa's eleven for
five days now and this is what I think
about it these are major changes that
you're going to notice right away so
we're going to start with control center
so let me show you now so this is what
iOS 11 looks like you can see that they
totally rearranged it and there's all
sorts of new options you can do here so
for instance I can go directly to an
alarm you don't have to go through the
timer's button anymore and all of this
is totally customizable another feature
that you're going to notice right away
is files your iPhone doesn't have files
the same way you know your Windows PC or
your Mac does now it does another thing
that you're going to notice is that Siri
has a new voice and Sirius picked up a
lot of new tricks I'm going to show you
one of my favorite new tricks so let's
go hey Siri how do you say I love to
dance
in Spanish mingi - hey Siri how do you
say I want to buy it in Italian so
obviously this is the kind of feature
that could be extremely helpful when
you're traveling or trying to
communicate with people who speak
different languages and you another
feature that you're going to notice
right away is the App Store has been
totally changed you know now Apple will
point you to apps that that they think
are really special for instance here's a
daily list and they're selected by
editors at Apple now we're going to go
over personally what I think is my
favorite new feature which is there is a
one-handed keyboard so this is the
normal iPhone keyboard but you can pick
either a left-handed keyboard or for me
the right-handed keyboard I can see
people just using this as kind of the
default finally Apple has totally
changed the way screen shot some work
now instead of just saving it to your
camera roll it puts it in the corner so
I'm going to open it up and I'm going to
pick a tool and you
can draw on your screenshot and share it
with someone the new iOS is definitely
worth updating - it comes out this fall
it really improves a lot of the small
day-to-day uses of your phone and it may
solve problems that you have wanted to
be solved for a long time so I
definitely recommend updating as soon as
you can
